result.execSummary:
The defendant Michaela M Barone was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michaela M Barone is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Michaela M Barone was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant shall pay $100 per month commencing August 1, 2022 and due the 1st of every month thereafter until paid in full.  Failure to make court ordered payments will result in termination of payment plan and all available enforcement actions will be taken without further notice.

Defendant shall contact the Iron County Sheriff's Department at (715) 561-2440 within 10 business days of sentencing to make arrangements to provide a DNA sample and to submit to the booking process.  Defendant shall also pay the surcharge for same.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michaela M Barone

records.addlTxt: 11:07 a.m.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Atty Brewer appears with def.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears on behalf of the State.  PLQ filed with Court.  Def admits going through with attorney.  Court goes through on record.  Def is satisfied with rep of Atty Brewer.  No questions.  Def understands rights.  Court goes through elements State would have to prove.  No coercion to plead.  Def knowingly, voluntarily, and intelligently pleading per Atty Brewer and def.  Court grants waiver.  Def has no questions.  MTD by DA to Dismiss Count #1.  No objection from defense.  Court grants.  Def pleds NC to Count #2 per Atty Brewer.  Parties stipulate to factual basis.  Def agrees.  Court accepts plea, finds def guilty, JOC to be entered.  DA addresses Court re agreement.  Vic rights complied with.  Atty Brewer addresses court prior to sentencing.  Def addresses Court prior to sentencing.  Court accepts recommendation and imposes $443.50.  Def to pay at a rate of $100 per month comencing 8/1/22.  Def shall submit to booking and DNA sample to be taken.  Adj.  11:18 a.m.  klr
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 29, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Pre-trial conference on May 19, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Pre-trial conference on May 19, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

09:01 AM Defendant Michaela M Barone in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Heidi E. Brewer appeared by video means for Defendant Michaela M Barone. Court calls case, cites appearances.  Atty Brewer has gone through complaint/charges/penalties, waives reading.  Def understands and stands mute.  PTC to be set 5/19 at 1:15 a.m.  Adj.  klr  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Would like to check with PD to see if qualifies.  Court explains process.  5/2 at 9:00 for AIA.  No contact with vic named in complaint.  Def indicates has no difficulty staying away from the residence.  Def indicates does not know who victim is.  Court advises def if contacts could be BJ.  $500 sig bond/NC with vic.  Adj.  9:25 a.m.  klr  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 09:00 am.
